title: Godofwars
author: Godofwars
content: HiHave you seen telegram messenger (with more than 800 million users) implemented a web 3.0 technology called "Fragment" to buy/sell usernames/numbers on TON blockchain?I think it is one of the first messengers to do that and i have seen usernames are being sold for milion dollars!!I think telegram is going to be the biggest messenger with blockchain technology !What do you think?

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: How much for my user name? I also have a lot of numbers, buy them from me and sell them higher there.ðŸ¤£

comments.author: Godofwars
comments.body: checkout @Tagsmarket on telegram to see the prices of usernames , you'll be shocked too !
